attributes.action: Maintain the existing levels of stamp duty until at least 2011
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are many people who are now placing houses on the market. These are first time buyer choice homes low cost.
We ask the PM and Chancellor to extend the Current Level of stamp duty.
This allows people to complete especially as the Christmas period fast approaches.
We there fore ask for the extention until at least December 2010. If this is not possible then Apr 2010. This allows for the VAT increase first folowed by Stamp Duty rather than the double whamy.
